On this page

Accordion ​

Basic Example ​

twig
<accordion>
    <template #title>
        Test Accordion
    </template>
    <template #icon>
        <svg></svg>
    </template>
    <template #content>
        Test Content
    </template>
</accordion>

Functionality ​

Styling ​

containerClasses
Prop
​

  • Type: String
  • Default: "border-x border-b border-gray-200 first:rounded-t last:rounded-b first:border-t "

buttonClasses
Prop
​

  • Type: String
  • Default: "flex justify-between items-center w-full px-s4 py-s2 bg-transparent interact:bg-blue-100 interact:outline-none transition duration-300"

panelClasses
Prop
​

  • Type: String
  • Default: "p-s4"

iconClasses
Prop
​

  • Type: String
  • Default: "rotate-0 transition duration-300"

iconTransitionClasses
Prop
​

  • Type: String
  • Default: "rotate-180 transition duration-300"

transitions
Prop
​

  • Type: Object
  • Default:
js
{
    enter: 'duration-200 ease-out',
    enterFrom: 'opacity-0',
    enterTo: 'opacity-100',
    leave: 'duration-200 ease-in',
    leaveFrom: 'opacity-100',
    leaveTo: 'opacity-0'
}

This option controls the transition when opening/closing the accordion.
